rooms.description: Open space with ample natural light and Scandinavian minimalist design elements. Large windows for optimal cross ventilation according to Vastu.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances and integrated storage, featuring a breakfast nook adjacent to the living area. Natural light is maximized as per Vastu guidelines for east or north facing.
Spacious dining room with Scandinavian style decor and comfortable seating. Designed to have an open layout connecting to the living area and kitchen.
Guest bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, featuring light hues and minimalistic Scandinavian furniture. Placed on the west side as per Vastu principles to maintain balance.
Spacious master bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom. North or east facing for auspicious energy in line with Vastu practices.
Dedicated home office designed with natural light and quiet environment. Features minimalist Scandinavian design and ergonomic workspace setup.
Fully equipped private gym with ample space for exercise equipment. Designed in a quiet corner away from the main living spaces to ensure privacy and minimize disturbance.

openings.description: Main entrance door with Scandinavian glass detailing ensuring safety and natural light. Vastu principles suggest north facing for auspicious entry.
Large front window that provides maximum morning sunlight as recommended by Vastu for east-facing openings.
